video:video.video:title: Online identity verification service miiCard
video:video.video:description: miiCard (My Internet Identity) is an identity verification service that lets you prove your real identity purely on the web to create trust online

video:video.video:title: ID verification service miiCard creates trust online by proving real identities
video:video.video:description: miiCard builds trust online by proving real identities on the web. Take control of your digital identity today with miiCard.

video:video.video:title: miiCard online identity verification | security and account protection
video:video.video:description: As an online identity service, security and protection is, and always will be, our first concern. Learn more about miiCard security and account protection here.

video:video.video:title: miiCard online identity verification | protecting your miiCard account
video:video.video:description: How miiCard protects your account - see how account protection features

video:video.video:title: miiCard in Financial Services replacing offline identity checks
video:video.video:description: miiCard verifies the identities of your customers to a Level of Assurance 3 (LOA 3) purely online and in real-time, removing the need for offline checks and processing.

video:video.video:title: Verify your identity on LinkedIn with miiCard
video:video.video:description: Verify your identity for LinkedIn in minutes - with a validated miiCard identity you can create trust on all your social networks | www.miiCard.com

video:video.video:title: Verify your identity for Twitter in minutes with miiCard
video:video.video:description: Verify your identity for Twitter in minutes - with a validated miiCard identity you can create trust on all your social networks | www.miiCard.com
